work_experience.title: Product Engineer & Web Developer
work_experience.description: Transformed the prototyping process for a venture studio, developing low-resolution mockups, using low-code tools, and running experiments, while leading meetings with CEOs to align technology solutions with business objectives. Developed a waste management app MVP reviewed by 3 major companies by integrating the back end, database, and UI. Led the development of a fintech solution providing credit access to 400+ app-based drivers by migrating from Webflow to Nuxt, implementing a scoring system, and a headless CMS.
work_experience.excerpt: Transformed prototyping for a venture studio, developed a waste management MVP, and led a fintech solution for 400+ drivers by migrating from Webflow to Nuxt.

work_experience.title: Web Developer
work_experience.description: Developed solutions for 4 projects at a staff augmentation and software development agency using feature-driven development principles to enhance functional design and user experience. Created a comprehensive UI for a U.S.-based client, defined API schemas, and collaborated with back-end developers to optimize usability and data structure. Led a team of 5 developers to ensure WCAG 2.0 compliance for a website with 100+ pages and optimized an admin e-commerce platform.
work_experience.excerpt: Created UI for a U.S. client, led a team ensuring WCAG 2.0 compliance for a 100+ page site, and optimized an admin e-commerce platform.

work_experience.title: Web Developer
work_experience.description: Developed WordPress themes for a marketing agency providing solutions to U.S. businesses. Managed 20+ weekly customer service tickets across 1K+ client websites, including bug fixes and new features. Streamlined theme development, reducing production time by 66% through two-week sprints and automated base theme deployment, reducing time from 1 day to 1 hour.
work_experience.excerpt: Developed WordPress themes for 1K+ clients, streamlined deployment, reduced production time by 66%, and automated change log communication.

work_experience.title: Network Operation Center Technician & Database Administrator
work_experience.description: Monitored infrastructure applications, servers, and databases, improving operational processes for the NOC and working with ticketing and monitoring systems. Completed courses in SQL Server, DB2, Linux, and Windows Server.
work_experience.excerpt: Monitored infrastructure apps, servers, databases, and improved NOC operational processes, working with ticketing and monitoring systems.

work_experience.title: Recruitment & Operations Intern
work_experience.description: Accomplished weekly recruiting goals, conducted phone screens and interviews, and implemented software that enhanced phone screen efficiency, reducing time per call.
work_experience.excerpt: Accomplished weekly recruiting goals, improved phone screen efficiency by implementing software, reducing time per call.

volunteering.title: Vice-Curator, Funding Officer & Shaper
volunteering.description: Empowered individuals through guidance on project execution, while handling logistics such as fundraising efforts, recruiting, fostering internal culture, building a website for external communication, and representing the organization in international events. Co-managed the 'Mi Futuro' project, providing vocational guidance to over 400 students in underrepresented communities through personality and vocational tests, mentorship connections, and scholarship information, while overseeing fundraising, content management, and scheduling logistics.
volunteering.excerpt: Empowered individuals through project guidance, logistics, fundraising, and recruiting. Co-managed 'Mi Futuro' and built a website for external communication.

volunteering.title: Organizer
volunteering.description: Promoted inclusivity in tech for a community of 900+ members through events like 'DevFest,' which attracted over 200 attendees. Managed event organization, fundraising, and strategic alliances while producing audiovisual content for social media and collaborating with 'Women Techmakers' to support female participation in technology.
volunteering.excerpt: Promoted inclusivity in tech for 900+ members via events like 'DevFest.' Managed event organization, fundraising, and collaborations with 'Women Techmakers.'
